newsitem.title: FINLAND: RESEARCH ALERT-CSFB KEEPS "BUY" ON RAISIO .
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT-CSFB KEEPS "BUY" ON RAISIO .

text.p: CS First Boston is keeping its buy recommendation on Finnish food, feed and chemicals group Raision Tehtaat Oy, it said in a research note received on Tuesday.
It based the decision on the expectation that Raisio's cholesterol-reducing Benecol margarine will account for half of Rasio's earnings in 1998.

"The main reason for our buy recommendation lies in the Benecol story. We are expecting Benecol to account for about one third of operating income in 1997 and two thirds in 1998," CSFB said in the research note dated February 14.
